summary: Identifying skill gaps and staffing needs is key to addressing the federal government’s IT workforce challenges. We evaluated how major executive agencies implemented the 8 IT workforce planning practices in our framework , like recognizing key skills employees will need and planning for them. Agencies made the most progress with 3 practices, including assessing gaps in skills and staffing. We recommended that three-quarters of the...
title: Information Technology: Agencies Need to Fully Implement Key Workforce Planning Activities
